issue.title: forum.ixbt.com - page scrolls to top after watching uploaded image
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=8:26203:3028#3028

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Reproduction
Go to any forum topic of web forum https://forum.ixbt.com
Find a post with uploaded image, [for example](https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=8:26203:3028#3028)
Click the image to expand.
After this your web-page scrolls to the top, this is annoying, cause you have to scroll down again to find the post you read.

Disabling **AdGuard/uBO - Cookie Notices** filter solves the problem. The problem exists on both uBlock Windows Chrome Addon and AdGuard IOS/Android applications.

I was sent here by https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/20405#issuecomment-1789873325

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> [#164590 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/164590#issuecomment-1781734622) @Divin1ty666 you should enable AdGuard Russian, also install AdGuard Extra.
> 
> This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.
> 
> If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.
> 
> If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.
> 
>     * [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
> 
>     * [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Спасибо, помогло!)

comment.body:
I have added these rules and additionally this one (filters update should be available in 1-2 hours):
```adblock
@@$subdocument,third-party,stealth=referrer,domain=sport.starsites.fun
```
it should fix issue with all video players on this website.
Thank you for your reply.

comment.body:
It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable that filter list or add this rule:
```adblock
bing.com#@$##b_tq_header, .header, .sbox { position: absolute !important; }
```
to the use rules.

Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Not reproduced on my end. 
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.vk.com/oraorachan](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.vk.com%2Foraorachan) ### Comment > Примерно с октября 2023 на разных устройствах и платформах начала отображаться "реклама в сообществах" в мобильной версии сайта Вконтакте. В обычной версии сайта реклама не отображается, только в мобильной. > Проблема на разных устройствах, на разных операционных системах и в разных браузерах. (на пк в Опера и Firefox, на андройде в Samsung Internet) > Ранее такой проблемы не наблюдалось. ### Screenshots

Desktop

### Add your comment and screenshots

Reproduction
Go to any forum topic of web forum https://forum.ixbt.com
Find a post with uploaded image, [for example](https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=8:26203:3028#3028)
Click the image to expand.
After this your web-page scrolls to the top, this is annoying, cause you have to scroll down again to find the post you read.

Disabling **AdGuard/uBO - Cookie Notices** filter solves the problem. The problem exists on both uBlock Windows Chrome Addon and AdGuard IOS/Android applications.

I was sent here by https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/20405#issuecomment-1789873325

issue.title: maisonbible.fr

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### AdGuard Extension version

4.2.208

### Browser version

Chrome 118

### OS version

Windows 11

### What filters do you have enabled?

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Issue Details

A cookie banner with html `<div id="cookie-consent-banner"` is hidden on our website https://maisonbible.fr. (The id has been renamed since then).
As this banner was shown as a bootstrap modal, only the backdrop displayed, but the modal itself was hidden by the rule as shown in Google developper console:

    #cookie-consent-banner {display:none}   /* user agent stylesheet */

### Expected Behavior

This behavior is not expected. A cookie consent banner is legally required, and is not an ad.
Hiding this banner can cripple the site in several ways:
- As in our case, it did not hide the backdrop of the cookie banner
- When applying the law to the letter, it is not allowed to place a cookie, unless the user approves it . This means, if the cookie banner is hidden, the website might miss basic features like login

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Additional Information

_No response_

issue.title: AdGuard hides div#cookie-consent-banner, but this is not an add, but a legally required feature
issue.body:
### AdGuard Extension version

4.2.208

### Browser version

Chrome 118

### OS version

Windows 11

### What filters do you have enabled?

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Issue Details

A cookie banner with html `<div id="cookie-consent-banner"` is hidden on our website https://maisonbible.fr. (The id has been renamed since then).
As this banner was shown as a bootstrap modal, only the backdrop displayed, but the modal itself was hidden by the rule as shown in Google developper console:

    #cookie-consent-banner {display:none}   /* user agent stylesheet */

### Expected Behavior

This behavior is not expected. A cookie consent banner is legally required, and is not an ad.
Hiding this banner can cripple the site in several ways:
- As in our case, it did not hide the backdrop of the cookie banner
- When applying the law to the letter, it is not allowed to place a cookie, unless the user approves it . This means, if the cookie banner is hidden, the website might miss basic features like login

### Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Additional Information

_No response_

comment.body:
@zloyden

Забыл уточнить - AdGuard Russian не стал включать, только доп адд-он. Если включать AdGuard Russian, то затирается еще и погода и ТВ программа. Хоть ТВ программа и не нужна, но она все же не "мусор", а погоду в принципе хотелось бы видеть, по этому AdGuard Russian filter не включаю. Может пофиксите заодно?)
